body:
Hello,

I'm very surprised cause the avicus community doesnt like the capture the wool, i've been playing overcast in the last 3 years, now, i want to play some avicus for having fun, but this is a thing that shocked me, sometimes i hear people that say "ctw sucks" or something like that... :o

So, i want to know, Why?
I suppose that is because the people usually camps in DTM servers.
Cause the people doesnt want to practice or dont play scrimmages and tourneys (i know that there are dtm and tdm maps in official events, but most of the maps are ctw).

I dont know, but, i would like to people in avicus try new things...
Its only a suggestion for improving...

Peace.

                                                                                                                                                   -Veopth (Dear Vieja).

replies.body: Well, Avicus is a copy of OCN, just an extremely poorly coded one, this explains all your lag spikes. They need powerful servers because the plugins use up loads of RAM.

replies.body:
After playing these days a bit more on CTW I can give several reasons:
- CTW is a good gamemode indeed imo, however some people dislike it generally 
- Some of the maps are really bad, no place to defend (I like to defend)
- Some regions are broken
- When I make a defense there's already the one guy that comes and starts covering my wall with wood etc
- No one else defenses. I rarely see other players then me defending on CTW, which makes it a very fast game where everybody rushes
- The rotation is very short. There are around 10 maps at total. The variation is pretty small so players start to get bored of this gamemode.
- The current 1.8 version is full of bugs like teleporting back, random inventory hotbar switching, spectator viewing glitch and other glitches which make the game, completely unplayable.
replies.body_tagged:

- No one else defenses. I rarely see other players then me defending on CTW, which makes it a very fast game where everybody rushes
- The rotation is very short. There are around 10 maps at total. The variation is pretty small so players start to get bored of this gamemode.
- The current 1.8 version is full of bugs like teleporting back, random inventory hotbar switching, spectator viewing glitch and other glitches which make the game, completely unplayable.
